items.title: Live2D Motion
items.rawContent:
{
    "parentId": "AFAD6CEFK59C1A4298SBABFE7AEC1B964622",
    "displayName": "$$0D29C97D3BC162449B4A44A896A5ED2186F4",
    "windowTitle": "Motion",
    "title": "Live2D Motion",
    "requiresThirdPartyComponents": ["live2d"],
    "type": "event_command",
    "id": "vn.L2DMotion",
    "group": "$$49C76C7F1C2EE8468B1BA2884C6A06B3C241",
    "subGroup": "$$9D7B8871KE8A7A410ES8CA3EA1F415A8BEA7",
    "color": "orange",
    "columns": [-1, 250],
    "nodes": [
    ],
    "defaultValue": { "characterId": GS.CONST.DEFAULT_RECORD_ID, "loop": 1, "fadeInTime": 1000, "data": { "motion": "" }, "waitForCompletion": 0},
    "inlineImage": { 
        "formula": "return !GSIsNull(p.expressionId) ? GS.VN.resourceForExpression(p.expressionId) : GS.VN.resourceForCharacter(p.characterId)", 
        "folder": "Graphics/Characters"
    },
    "quickItems": [
        GSQ.CONTROLS.CHARACTER_SELECTION,
        {
            "label": "$$4870958C3ABB1243A2591832E3311D039368",
            "valueFormula": "return p.data.motion || lcs('D7DC911DKCCB9A4DE9SBE26EBFCCA4CB0826');",
            "type": "GSQPopupField",
            "dialog": { "uid": "0999C3BCKFFE3A4590SAA49ED4419771C068" },
            "attribute": "data"
        },
        GSQ.CONTROLS.CHECK_BOX("$$1BEC6000K432BA4248S9D9DE3B81A14B9B42", "loop"),
        GSQ.CONTROLS.CREATE_FADE_IN_MS("Fade-In", "fadeInTime"),
        GSQ.CONTROLS.WAIT_FOR_COMPLETION
    ],
    "sections": [
    ]
}
items.name: Live2D Motion
